attributes.action:
DECREASE the £18,600 income per annum for spouse visas.  

Fair British Wages.
attributes.additional_details:
People from outside the EU can bring so much more to Great Britain, these people are willing to work & not be on benefits or sponge off British People. As a young man wanting to start a family just like many others but these per annum incomes is nothing but a barrier between loved ones. We need a U-Turn on this. Many are in my shoes & we plead to the Government & the people of Britain to not put an overrated per annum.

North East of England is no where close in getting.

I want to enjoy life.
attributes.background: Britain's wages in North East England cannot get jobs that is equivalent to £18,600 per annum. It is absurd & not fit for purpose, take into consideration full time applicants who are on minimum wage & can afford for both people. Also people from outside EU are qualified individuals.
